author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Icade: Icade Sante Buys 14 Nursing Homes; Icade Promotion Sells Office Building
text:
March 30 (Reuters) - ICADE SA:
* ANNOUNCED ON THURSDAY ACQUISITION OF 14 NURSING HOMES BY ICADE SANTÉ FOR EUR 189 MLN FROM RESIDALYA NETWORK, SUBSIDIARY OF ACKERMANS & VAN HAAREN GROUP
* NURSING HOMES ACQUISITION EXPECTED TO BE COMPLETED IN JULY 2018
* OFF-PLAN SALE OF AN OFFICE BUILDING BY ICADE PROMOTION, 18,000 SQ.M FOR EUR 95 MLN TO SCPI ELYSÉES PIERRE, MANAGED BY HSBC REIM
Source text: bit.ly/2pPQq5V Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
